Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the betacoronaviruses spike protein family.
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.33082259]Virus:SARS-CoV-2:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in 293T cells(IC50=10±8 nM,IC90=98±57 nM),inhibition of infection in Vero E6 cells(IC50~ 6 nM);SARS-CoV-2_D614G:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in 293T cells(IC50=8±4 nM,IC90=96±50 nM);SARS-CoV-2_S943P:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in 293T cells(IC50=6±4 nM,IC90=75±42 nM);SARS-CoV-2_S247R:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in 293T cells(IC50=9±7 nM,IC90=78±59 nM);MERS-CoV:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in 293T cells(IC50=35±10 nM,IC90>1000 nM),inhibition of infection in Vero E6 cells(IC50~ 3 nM);SARS-CoV-1:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in 293T cells(IC50=7±5 nM,IC90=43±6 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.33082259]Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:18% Cytotoxicity at 10 µM;Vero E6 cells:12% Cytotoxicity at 1 µM,30% Cytotoxicity at 10 µM;Human airway epithelial cells:25% Cytotoxicity at 1 µM.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The lipopeptide is derived from the C-terminal heptad repeat (HRC) domain of SARS-CoV-2 S that potently inhibits infection by SARS-CoV-2.

Literature.Title: Inhibition of Coronavirus Entry In Vitro and Ex Vivo by a Lipid-Conjugated Peptide Derived from the SARS-CoV-2 Spike Glycoprotein HRC Domain.
Literature.Author: Outlaw VK, Bovier FT, Mears MC, Cajimat MN, Zhu Y, Lin MJ, Addetia A, Lieberman NAP, Peddu V, Xie X, Shi PY, Greninger AL, Gellman SH, Bente DA, Moscona A, Porotto M.

Literature.Title: Intranasal fusion inhibitory lipopeptide prevents direct-contact SARS-CoV-2 transmission in ferrets.
Literature.Author: de Vries RD, Schmitz KS, Bovier FT, Predella C, Khao J, Noack D, Haagmans BL, Herfst S, Stearns KN, Drew-Bear J, Biswas S, Rockx B, McGill G, Dorrello NV, Gellman SH, Alabi CA, de Swart RL, Moscona A, Porotto M.
